amendment.description: Amendment adds language to express the sense of Congress clarifying that the Buy America Act applies to an entire bridge project and not only to component parts of such project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to express the sense of Congress clarifying that the Buy America Act applies to overall projects, and not their component parts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baird amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
